RequirementExpertisePage.heading: Common Problems About Digitalization
RequirementExpertisePage.subheading: The more companies grow, the better projects emerge. But there are common problems that need to be solved.
RequirementExpertisePage.subheadingtxt1: With our expert consultants, we develop projects tailored to the new technological needs of institutions and provide innovative financial solutions.
RequirementExpertisePage.subheadingtxt2: With agile project managers, we carefully track processes to deliver developments on time and with precision.
RequirementExpertisePage.subheadingtxt3: Bringing new ideas to life requires collaboration with experts. Our experienced team is committed to providing innovative, customized solutions to meet your unique needs.
RequirementExpertisePage.subheadingtxt4: Companies seeking unique products for their business processes often encounter integration issues with existing systems. We develop the most suitable solutions based on our needs analysis.

AboutPage.heading: About Our Business
AboutPage.description1: Siyeso Software Technologies, founded in 2019 to develop R&D projects tailored to the needs of institutions in the banking and finance sectors, specializes in Core Banking, Wealth Management, Precious Metals Platform, and Treasury and Capital Markets Solutions. The company continues its presence at Teknopark Istanbul, focusing on delivering innovative solutions to its clients.
AboutPage.description2: Our company operates with a customer-focused Agile (AGILE) methodology, developing software in a manner that is both aligned with planned delivery timelines and conducive to effective team collaboration with stakeholders.
AboutPage.description3: We offer solutions that help our clients enhance their competitive edge in rapidly changing market conditions through projects developed with platform-independent, next-generation technologies.
AboutPage.description4: With our experienced team, we continue to deliver projects aimed at transforming the business models of both domestic and international institutions, adding value to our clients.

OurExpertisePage.heading: Our Expertise
OurExpertisePage.subheading: We develop projects in the following areas.
OurExpertisePage.firstgridsubheading1: The Precious Metals Platform manages transactions in exchanges, banks, and financial institutions.
OurExpertisePage.firstgridsubheading2: This system optimizes precious metals transactions, provides profit/loss analysis and balance sheet automation, and integrates financial resources into the system.
OurExpertisePage.secondgridsubheading1: Our digital, international, and cloud-based system creates financial products and expands access to capital markets.
OurExpertisePage.secondgridsubheading2: Utilizing IoT technology, it enables real-time data transmission and manages securities transactions, risk management, customer accounts, and reporting all on a single platform.
OurExpertisePage.thirdgridsubhaeding: The Siyeso Wealth Management Solution is a comprehensive private banking financial tool, meticulously designed to address the challenges faced by asset managers and support the execution of sustainable and profitable business operations.
OurExpertisePage.forthgridsubheading: New solutions are developed, integrated with financial systems.

PolicyPrivacyPage.heading: Policy Privacy
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub1title1: This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of your information when you use the Service and tells you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub1title2: We use your personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub1title3: We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is handled responsibly.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub1title4: Understanding our privacy policy will help you make informed decisions about sharing your information with us.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub2title1: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you.We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and specific details.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub2title2: We may obtain information about you from third-party sources to enhance our services.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub3title1: User data is critical for ensuring security and preventing fraud. This data can encompass a range of information beyond personal details, including user interactions, preferences, and transaction history. These insights not only help us understand and enhance the functioning of our service but also enable us to personalize user experiences and optimize our offerings. Additionally, they are utilized for purposes such as identifying and mitigating security threats, detecting fraud, and ensuring compliance with legal requirements. Therefore, the accurate collection, utilization, and protection of personal data are vital for ensuring both your privacy and the security of our service.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub3title2: Usage Data may include information such as your device's Internet Protocol address (e.g., IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub4title1: Your data may be shared with our trusted business partners who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business activities.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub4title2: We may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub5title1: We implement strong security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub5title2: Regular security audits and encryption technologies ensure the safety of your data.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub5title3: Despite our efforts, no security system is infallible, and we recommend that you also take precautions.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub6title1: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub6title2: You can stop receiving promotional communications from us at any time.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub6title3: Our policy details the process for exercising your data protection rights.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub7title1: We may update our privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub7title2: Significant changes will be notified to you via our website or by email.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub7title3: Continuing to use our services after policy changes means that you accept the new terms.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub8title1: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us at
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub8title2: Our support team is here to address any issues related to your privacy and data protection.
PolicyPrivacyPage.sub8title3: We value your feedback and strive to improve our privacy practices based on your input.
PolicyPrivacyPage.contactUssub: For any questions regarding our privacy policy, please reach us at
